text: Zuma Beach is a 1978 American television comedy movie directed by Lee H. Katzin and starring Suzanne Somers, Steven Keats, Mark Wheeler, Kimberly Beck, Perry Lang, Michael Biehn, Rosanna Arquette, Tayna Roberts, Gary Imhoff, Timothy Hutton. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Lee H. Katzin
title: Zuma Beach
